field.name: description
field.value:
Well, I have installed SP1 for VS2005 after uninstalling the WebProject patch I tried to run the distributed sample <http://www.castleproject.org/download/monorail/v1rc2/MonoRail.GettingStartedSampleVS2005.zip> I always get the same exception - VS2005 can't open this type of project
So I tried to create a sample project manually as described in Getting Started tutorial without the wizard, I have the RC2 for .NET2 installed and I see the Castle Template projects.See the attached exception when I try to create a MonoRail project from Castle Wizard (I chose the default settings)
When I run my manual sample: I get Could not load type 'NVelocity.Runtime.Resource.IResourceManager'
Could you tell me what part I have to install again? It seems to me that I'm missing a dll or something ...
Thanks a lot,
Breezback
